14.41.text:
KAREN FOLEY: Hello, and welcome
to the Student Hub Live.

17.43.text:
Well, today is the 12th
of September, 2016.

21.14.text:
I'm Karen Foley, and we have
a fantastic two hours lined up

24.55.text:
for you about learning online
and the writing process.

28.63.text:
So I'm hoping that some of
you have been here before.

30.84.text:
And I'm hoping that we have
a lot of new students also.

33.73.text:
Today is all about getting
skilled up for module start.

37.14.text:
And I'm hoping that this
appeals to students irrespective

39.51.text:
of what level or what
qualification you're studying.

42.12.text:
I hope that there's
something in here that

43.87.text:
will inspire you to
feel a little bit more

45.79.text:
ready for your start at the
end of the month, for October.

50.20.text:
So these sessions
are for everybody.

51.99.text:
Students and academics,
everybody is welcome.

54.31.text:
You can drop in and
out as you wish.

57.03.text:
You can watch it
on Catch Up also,

58.76.text:
if you aren't able to
attend the whole session.

60.72.text: So I do hope that you enjoy it.

62.93.text:
Now, there are two ways
to engage with this.

64.99.text:
There's the Watch
and Engage option,

66.49.text:
which is the best, because
you can see all of the chat

70.48.text:
And you can also
tell us what you

71.85.text:
think using our interactive
widgets, which I'm

73.77.text: going to show you in a second.

75.11.text:
So if you aren't in that option
and you're in the Livestream

77.79.text:
only, then you need to
go back to the website,

80.31.text:
studenthublive.@open.ac.uk and
click on the Watch and Engage

85.06.text:
option, sign in using your
normal student details.

87.82.text:
And if you don't have those, you
can request a visitor account.

91.81.text:
So please do do that
if you haven't already.

94.74.text:
But that's not the only
way you can engage with us.

96.86.text:
You can also send us
messages on Twitter.

103.57.text:
And you can email us as well,
which is studenthub@open.ac.uk.

109.19.text:
Now, for those of you
in the Watch and Engage,

111.11.text:
I'd like to point out
just a couple of things.

113.07.text:
You should be able to see
a video of the Livestream

115.23.text:
here in the studio,
in Milton Keynes.

117.05.text:
And you should also be
able to see a chat option.

119.45.text:
Now, this chat, if lots
of people are chatting--

121.45.text:
and I know that you all are--
it can go very, very fast.

124.71.text:
There is a little
pen at the top,

126.27.text:
and you can hold that
to scroll down and see

128.18.text:
the chat if there's
something you've missed

129.97.text:
or something you
want to pick up on.

131.92.text: You can also change the layout.

133.63.text:
So you can click on the
bottom right-hand corner

135.81.text:
and you get different
screen views

137.28.text:
where the chat will
be larger or smaller.

138.99.text:
So see which option
suits you best.

140.67.text:
And hopefully that will
make your experience

So I'd like to

how you're feeling, which
level you're studying,

149.96.text:
you feel about starting
your next module

152.20.text:
and whether or not you

So we're going to

should be appearing, if

So the map, you just

that has a list

and you can't think

put an X or something

because you can't

fill all the fields in for

So let us see where you

and we'll feedback

But I'd like to
